VIII.iv.4.A.1.g
.
Showing the Denial of SMC in Rating Decisions
The denial of SMC must be addressed in the
Narrative
of the rating decision using the text generated by the software application with which the rating activity prepares the decision.
Note
:
The generated text should be considered the baseline text for the narrative denial of SMC.Â  The rating activity should edit the generated text as necessary to provide details specific to the individual SMC claim.
